00028 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #ifndef __HT32F5XXXX_I2S_H
00030 #define __HT32F5XXXX_I2S_H
00031 
00032 #ifdef __cplusplus
00033  extern "C" {
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00037 #include "ht32.h"
00038 
00039 /** @addtogroup HT32F5xxxx_Peripheral_Driver HT32F5xxxx Peripheral Driver
00040   * @{
00041   */
00042 
00043 /** @addtogroup I2S
00044   * @{
00045   */
00046 
00047 
00048 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /** @defgroup I2S_Exported_Types I2S exported types
00050   * @{
00051   */
00052 typedef struct
00053 {
00054   u32 I2S_Mode;
00055   u32 I2S_Format;
00056   u32 I2S_WordWidth;
00057   u32 I2S_MclkOut;
00058   u32 I2S_MclkInv;
00059   u32 I2S_BclkInv;
00060   u32 I2S_X_Div;
00061   u32 I2S_Y_Div;
00062   u32 I2S_N_Div;
00063 } I2S_InitTypeDef;
00064 /**
00065   * @}
00066   */
00067 
00068 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00069 /** @defgroup I2S_Exported_Constants I2S exported constants
00070   * @{
00071   */
00072 /* mode                                                                                                     */
00073 #define I2S_MASTER_TX                             (1UL << 1)
00074 #define I2S_MASTER_RX                             (1UL << 2)
00075 #define I2S_MASTER_TX_RX                          ((1UL << 1) | (1UL << 2))
00076 
00077 #define I2S_SLAVE_TX                              ((1UL << 3) | (1UL << 1))
00078 #define I2S_SLAVE_RX                              ((1UL << 3) | (1UL << 2))
00079 #define I2S_SLAVE_TX_RX                           ((1UL << 3) | (1UL << 1) | (1UL << 2))
00080 
00081 #define IS_I2S_MODE(MOD)                          ((MOD == I2S_MASTER_TX) || \
00082                                                    (MOD == I2S_MASTER_RX) || \
00083                                                    (MOD == I2S_MASTER_TX_RX) || \
00084                                                    (MOD == I2S_SLAVE_TX) || \
00085                                                    (MOD == I2S_SLAVE_RX) || \
00086                                                    (MOD == I2S_SLAVE_TX_RX))
00087 
00088 
00089 /* format                                                                                                   */
00090 #define I2S_JUSTIFIED_STEREO                      (0)
00091 #define LEFT_JUSTIFIED_STEREO                     (1UL << 6)
00092 #define RIGHT_JUSTIFIED_STEREO                    (2UL << 6)
00093 #define I2S_JUSTIFIED_REPEAT                      (1UL << 10)
00094 
00095 #define I2S_JUSTIFIED_STEREO_EXT                  (1UL << 8)
00096 #define LEFT_JUSTIFIED_STEREO_EXT                 ((1UL << 8) | (1UL << 6))
00097 #define RIGHT_JUSTIFIED_STEREO_EXT                ((1UL << 8) | (2UL << 6))
00098 #define I2S_JUSTIFIED_REPEAT_EXT                  ((1UL << 8) | (1UL << 10))
00099 
00100 #define I2S_JUSTIFIED_MONO                        (1UL << 11)
00101 #define LEFT_JUSTIFIED_MONO                       ((1UL << 11) | (1UL << 6))
00102 #define RIGHT_JUSTIFIED_MONO                      ((1UL << 11) | (2UL << 6))
00103 
00104 #define I2S_JUSTIFIED_MONO_EXT                    ((1UL << 8) | (1UL << 11))
00105 #define LEFT_JUSTIFIED_MONO_EXT                   ((1UL << 8) | (1UL << 11) | (1UL << 6))
00106 #define RIGHT_JUSTIFIED_MONO_EXT                  ((1UL << 8) | (1UL << 11) | (2UL << 6))
00107 
00108 #define IS_I2S_FORMAT(FMT)                        ((FMT == I2S_JUSTIFIED_STEREO) || \
00109                                                    (FMT == LEFT_JUSTIFIED_STEREO) || \
00110                                                    (FMT == RIGHT_JUSTIFIED_STEREO) || \
00111                                                    (FMT == I2S_JUSTIFIED_REPEAT) || \
00112                                                    (FMT == I2S_JUSTIFIED_STEREO_EXT) || \
00113                                                    (FMT == LEFT_JUSTIFIED_STEREO_EXT) || \
00114                                                    (FMT == RIGHT_JUSTIFIED_STEREO_EXT) || \
00115                                                    (FMT == I2S_JUSTIFIED_REPEAT_EXT) || \
00116                                                    (FMT == I2S_JUSTIFIED_MONO) || \
00117                                                    (FMT == LEFT_JUSTIFIED_MONO) || \
00118                                                    (FMT == RIGHT_JUSTIFIED_MONO) || \
00119                                                    (FMT == I2S_JUSTIFIED_MONO_EXT) || \
00120                                                    (FMT == LEFT_JUSTIFIED_MONO_EXT) || \
00121                                                    (FMT == RIGHT_JUSTIFIED_MONO_EXT))
00122 
00123 
00124 /* word width                                                                                               */
00125 #define I2S_WORDWIDTH_8                           (0)
00126 #define I2S_WORDWIDTH_16                          (1UL << 4)
00127 #define I2S_WORDWIDTH_24                          (2UL << 4)
00128 #define I2S_WORDWIDTH_32                          (3UL << 4)
00129 
00130 #define IS_I2S_WORD_WIDTH(WIDTH)                  ((WIDTH == I2S_WORDWIDTH_8) || \
00131                                                    (WIDTH == I2S_WORDWIDTH_16) || \
00132                                                    (WIDTH == I2S_WORDWIDTH_24) || \
00133                                                    (WIDTH == I2S_WORDWIDTH_32))
00134 
00135 
00136 /* clock divider                                                                                            */
00137 #define IS_I2S_MCLK_DIV(X, Y)                     ((X > 0) && (X < 256) && (Y > 0) && (Y < 256) && (X <= Y))
00138 
00139 #define IS_I2S_BCLK_DIV(N)                        (N < 256)
00140 
00141 
00142 /* FIFO                                                                                                     */
00143 #define I2S_TX_FIFO                               (1UL << 8)
00144 #define I2S_RX_FIFO                               (2UL << 8)
00145 
00146 #define IS_I2S_ONE_FIFO(FIFO)                     ((FIFO == I2S_TX_FIFO) || (FIFO == I2S_RX_FIFO))
00147 
00148 #define IS_I2S_TWO_FIFO(FIFO)                     (((FIFO & 0xFFFFFCFF) == 0) && (FIFO != 0))
00149 
00150 #define IS_I2S_FIFO_LEVEL(LEVEL)                  ((LEVEL & 0x0000000F) < 9)
00151 
00152 
00153 /* interrupt                                                                                                */
00154 #define I2S_INT_TXFIFO_TRI                        (1UL)
00155 #define I2S_INT_TXFIFO_UDF                        (1UL << 1)
00156 #define I2S_INT_TXFIFO_OVF                        (1UL << 2)
00157 
00158 #define I2S_INT_RXFIFO_TRI                        (1UL << 4)
00159 #define I2S_INT_RXFIFO_UDF                        (1UL << 5)
00160 #define I2S_INT_RXFIFO_OVF                        (1UL << 6)
00161 
00162 #define IS_I2S_INT(INT)                           (((INT & 0xFFFFFF88) == 0) && (INT != 0))
00163 
00164 
00165 /* flag                                                                                                     */
00166 #define I2S_FLAG_TXFIFO_TRI                       (1UL)
00167 #define I2S_FLAG_TXFIFO_UDF                       (1UL << 1)
00168 #define I2S_FLAG_TXFIFO_OVF                       (1UL << 2)
00169 #define I2S_FLAG_RXFIFO_TRI                       (1UL << 8)
00170 #define I2S_FLAG_RXFIFO_UDF                       (1UL << 9)
00171 #define I2S_FLAG_RXFIFO_OVF                       (1UL << 10)
00172 
00173 #define I2S_FLAG_TXFIFO_EMP                       (1UL << 3)
00174 #define I2S_FLAG_TXFIFO_FUL                       (1UL << 4)
00175 #define I2S_FLAG_RXFIFO_EMP                       (1UL << 11)
00176 #define I2S_FLAG_RXFIFO_FUL                       (1UL << 12)
00177 #define I2S_FLAG_RIGHT_CH                         (1UL << 16)
00178 #define I2S_FLAG_TX_BUSY                          (1UL << 17)
00179 #define I2S_FLAG_CLK_RDY                          (1UL << 18)
00180 
00181 #define IS_I2S_FLAG_CLEAR(FLAG)                   (((FLAG & 0xFFFFF8F8) == 0) && (FLAG != 0))
00182 
00183 #define IS_I2S_FLAG(FLAG)                         ((FLAG == I2S_FLAG_TXFIFO_TRI) || \
00184                                                    (FLAG == I2S_FLAG_TXFIFO_UDF) || \
00185                                                    (FLAG == I2S_FLAG_TXFIFO_OVF) || \
00186                                                    (FLAG == I2S_FLAG_TXFIFO_EMP) || \
00187                                                    (FLAG == I2S_FLAG_TXFIFO_FUL) || \
00188                                                    (FLAG == I2S_FLAG_RXFIFO_TRI) || \
00189                                                    (FLAG == I2S_FLAG_RXFIFO_UDF) || \
00190                                                    (FLAG == I2S_FLAG_RXFIFO_OVF) || \
00191                                                    (FLAG == I2S_FLAG_RXFIFO_EMP) || \
00192                                                    (FLAG == I2S_FLAG_RXFIFO_FUL) || \
00193                                                    (FLAG == I2S_FLAG_RIGHT_CH) || \
00194                                                    (FLAG == I2S_FLAG_TX_BUSY) || \
00195                                                    (FLAG == I2S_FLAG_CLK_RDY))
00196 
00197 
00198 /* PDMA request                                                                                             */
00199 #define I2S_PDMAREQ_TX                            (1UL << 13)
00200 #define I2S_PDMAREQ_RX                            (1UL << 14)
00201 
00202 #define IS_I2S_PDMA_REQ(REQ)                      (((REQ & 0xFFFF9FFF) == 0) && (REQ != 0))
00203 /**
00204   * @}
00205   */
00206

00208 /** @defgroup I2S_Exported_Functions I2S exported functions
00209   * @{
00210   */
00211 void I2S_DeInit(void);
00212 void I2S_Init(I2S_InitTypeDef* I2S_InitStruct);
00213 void I2S_Cmd(ControlStatus NewState);
00214 void I2S_MclkOutputCmd(ControlStatus NewState);
00215 void I2S_TxMuteCmd(ControlStatus NewState);
00216 void I2S_PDMACmd(u32 I2S_PDMAREQ, ControlStatus NewState);
00217 void I2S_FIFOReset(u32 I2S_FIFO);
00218 void I2S_FIFOTrigLevelConfig(u32 I2S_FIFO, u32 I2S_FIFOLevel);
00219 u8 I2S_GetFIFOStatus(u32 I2S_FIFO);
00220 void I2S_IntConfig(u32 I2S_Int, ControlStatus NewState);
00221 FlagStatus I2S_GetFlagStatus(u32 I2S_Flag);
00222 void I2S_ClearFlag(u32 I2S_Flag);
00223 /**
00224   * @}
00225   */
